website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for baby's first food after breast milk or formula.
pros: Can be mixed with breast milk or formula
cons: Upon arrival, some packages were near or past their expiration date

customer_reviews.title: product contains sunflower lecithin so be AWARE
customer_reviews.text: Allergic to sunflower products. Content said only soy lecithin on the site. When it arrived it said soy and sunflower lecithin. When I complained I was told that the disclaimer warns you of discrepancy.Buyer be aware.One star because it is required otherwise 0.
customer_reviews.author: pd

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s crazy how I use to buy one baby cereal from a supermarket for a price that was expensive and it was a smaller size. I’ll never buy baby cereal or baby food from the supermarket on its own when I can purchase the bigger size in a pack of 6 for an incredible price point! It last a long time, and my baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Babzs83

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy.. I recieved my box quickly and in good shape. They are exactly as described nice big 16 oz containers of rice cereal and i like that they are completely full none of this half to three quarters filled crap like a lot of products these days.. my son will have cereal for days!!!! Lol. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Scott

customer_reviews.title: Loves mixed with night bottle, you get A LOT for this price
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this mixed with his night bottle, keeps him fuller through the night. Bought because of price. I plan to sell a few because I simply won’t use them all though.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: GI doctor recommended this to be added to our daughters formula since she was spitting up a ton. Almost every feed milk was coming out of her nose. 1 tsp:1oz of formula was all it took. Has helped significantly. My daughter seems to enjoy the taste.
customer_reviews.author: LuliluTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This rice is just about $4.50 a container here in San Diego County. Ordering this one saves me about $5 and who doesnt love saving money. I used this for my daughter and now my son and wont use another brand. Cant wait for him to start other foods with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived within two business days so that was nice. All the containers were clean and sealed. The box they came in was great because it works as storage as well. I probably won't need to purchase it again since my daughter will be pasted the cereal stage by the time we use them but I would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: thelizwiley

customer_reviews.title: Best choice out there
customer_reviews.text: Very clean cut appearance on arrival. Mixes up very smooth. Have to use this as a thickening agent in our baby’s bottle due to severe reflux issues but have also mixed up for spoon feeding and mixes well both ways.
customer_reviews.author: Sara1818

customer_reviews.title: Purchased value pack but they were close to Expiration date, will have to throw out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and they were close to expiration date. I got the value pack because I thought I’d have more time to use them but I’ll have to throw them out since they weren’t used and it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McNeely

customer_reviews.title: First cereal
customer_reviews.text: Six in a box. The expiration date is not enough to eat all the six containers. Doesn’t go well with banana or other food. Just eat it without adding other things.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Larger bottles
customer_reviews.text: Packaging must larger than I thought, based on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: cheap, tasty
customer_reviews.text: My son is a picky eater and we usually put cereal in hiss milk. Sometime he eats cereal mixed with milk and fruit. The price is very low as compared to my local supermarkets ( over $5).
customer_reviews.author: M. Siewierska

customer_reviews.title: Bought for 5 month old baby boy
customer_reviews.text: I mix these with other flavors or just formula for my 5 month old boy, make sure to warm it up a bit so it isnt as chunky, but other than that, he loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pand

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you do need this much
customer_reviews.text: You may think you dont need this much but im telling you ITS A FREAKING LIFE SAVER!!! Just mash some fruit or open a pouch and add some rice, viola! Mini meal for your bby. Its quicker than making a bottle at times. If they offered a variety pack with rice, oatmeal, & barely I'd be in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco

customer_reviews.title: my baby is 5 months now and I try to ...
customer_reviews.text: my baby is 5 months now and I try to give him something other than formula milk. I tried this and baby likes it
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money! Makes it much more convenient than going to the store and buying them individually!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Like the convenience of buying them in bulk, no hassle. Our baby seems to enjoy the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Vonne

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favorite thing to eat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these had to get some before they run out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: GERBER RICE CEREAL
customer_reviews.text: IT'S PRETTY GOOD, AND HAS IRON FOR SURE, THESE LAST A WHILE.
customer_reviews.author: THE BARBIE DOLL

customer_reviews.title: Gerber baby cereal rice
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not I use this as a bridge with my kitten's from formula to food. When just nursing doesn't satisfy my kitten's I mix one scoop of vetscription dry kitten formula with a table spoon of gerber rice baby cereal and use it as their first taste of food. AlI of my kitten's have eaten this and are happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Rena M. Mason

customer_reviews.title: healthy
customer_reviews.text: This oatmeal is pretty good. My baby also eats this. Now I buy it for my nephew. I hope he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good base food
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to make and Mix it with any other tasty stuff.
customer_reviews.author: sid

customer_reviews.title: Super bland and the only cereal he likes
customer_reviews.text: I love it because in volume/subscription pricing this is the cheapest I've ever seen by far and it's the only cereal our little boy likes.
customer_reviews.author: Cyle Caplinger

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing this cereal pack for my daughter. This is the first time experiencing ever! Broken sealing and broken cap in two bottles. Now I have to throw out the one with the broken sealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little man loves it
customer_reviews.text: So far doing a great job, helping with my kiddo's development
customer_reviews.author: 1Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it. It was the first solid food we introduced. We mixed it later with some fruit and he also enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Win-Win!
customer_reviews.text: Saved me a trip to Wal-Mart and saved me money too, it's a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rearick

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults who need Gluten-Free- this is very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for adults who need Gluten-Free- this is very easy to digest, can carry it in smaller packets in your purse and if in need of a snack just mix with hot water. Also great in that it absorbs other ingredients well. I make a little mix with butter, dill, and eat with eggs. Tastes rather bland overall but a good substitute if you can't eat wheat products. Also of course great for babies, but Moms and Dads would have to comment upon that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product received
customer_reviews.text: Just received my order and got oatmeal not rice cereal
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: We like that this product is easy to use and it blends in my breast milk easily. It keeps our baby full longer.
customer_reviews.author: David Fawthrop

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.text: The cereal came in great time. The dates are all great.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Long

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! My daughter has to have rice cereal in her bottle for her to keep down formula and this value pack is fantastic! It has saved us a bunch of money!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: YUMMM
customer_reviews.text: I love this cereal. I eat it with raspberries and bananas. The 16 ounce package is a bit bulky but it holds the cereal better than the previous cardboard box. So five stars all around
customer_reviews.author: Haiponers

customer_reviews.title: You don't have to be a baby to love it!
customer_reviews.text: DELICIUS!! You don't have to be a baby to love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Works for special needs cat!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for my special needs cat. Helps to keep her stools normal.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: great but constipates
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but it really constipates my son. I didn't realize it was in a pack of 6 and I had ordered 2, and now I don't even need all that.
customer_reviews.author: Edit

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Put some in the bottle or put some in a bowl with water and feed it to the baby. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: this is the new way they package this product and it works well, seems like the product is well protected inside the container, it looks bulkier than before.
customer_reviews.author: H K

customer_reviews.title: now eat the milk he was much better, I think I will always give him to ...
customer_reviews.text: My stomach is very sensitive child, now eat the milk he was much better, I think I will always give him to eat this
customer_reviews.author: tu xiaohui

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value. The cereal arrived promptly and was well packed.I have ordered it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it at this price. Will buy it again here once my stock is exhausted.
customer_reviews.author: Loganoid

customer_reviews.title: Gerber cereal at the best price if you need it in a rush
customer_reviews.text: Gerber cereal at the best price if you need it in a rush. Arrives on 2 days with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Hermann E. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The baby loves it, that's all you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! It has good nutrition.But the expiration date are so close. When I got it , it had 7 months to go~ Wish to have the newest ones next time.
customer_reviews.author: LadyNancy

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to measure
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has severe reflux so her doctor has us mix this cereal with her formula to thicken it. It's easy to measure, mixes well, and the expiration date is far enough in advance that we've got no chance of coming close to it expiring before we get through it. I do wish the top were designed differently - we pour it into an old formula container to measure out of because the hole in the top is just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat the price and convenience of the 6-pack. I would reccommend auto order. The lid is not great for scooping, but works well for pouring
customer_reviews.author: Christina A. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Look closely at the ounces! I didn't realize I ...
customer_reviews.text: Look closely at the ounces! I didn't realize I was purchasing 6 very LARGE containers of cereal_ I will never use all of this!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Washington

customer_reviews.title: More like dolls, shelf life is longer.
customer_reviews.text: More like dolls, shelf life is longer, it is recommended to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good thickener for sauces. Good breakfast cereal, too.
customer_reviews.text: Unconventional user. Purchased for myself, a retired adult male. Makes a great thickener that doesn't need cooking. But I consume it as a breakfast cereal. Loved it as a baby. Love it in my dotage. Easy on the stomach, too.
customer_reviews.author: Organgrinder1010

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love getting these in bulk! Saved me time from going to the grocery store!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Patton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... Gerber rice cereal, you are a life saver! My pediatrician recommended adding 1/2 tablespoon of this cereal to my baby's bottle when she was 3 months because she wouldn't sleep. Back then she was already drinking 4-6oz of formula and was still always hungry and fussy. And, pediatrician did not want me to give her more milk since she was so small, so recommended this cereal. Well, she is now 9 months and has been sleeping through the night ever since! Now, I add 1 tablespoon of this cereal to her 6oz of formula and she loves it! Since many of you are asking about expiration dates. I purchased on 2/2015 and they expire 4/2016.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for baby
customer_reviews.text: my baby is enjoying it. its so easy to prepare and the best solid food for the baby to introduce. the only thing is after feeding i see black residue in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: sabi_biz

customer_reviews.title: Look at expiration date
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is grat as usual. A work of caution about amazon.com as a seller: A month ago I purchased baby rice in a local grocery store with expiration date around October 2017. A month later I purchased a box of 6 from amazon.com and I got a product with expiration date of May 2017. It is not expired but it is not as fresh as the one from my local store.
customer_reviews.author: T. Janowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great gluten free substitute for cream of wheat.
customer_reviews.author: X. Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: It tastes sweet. If it's original flavor, it's more better for baby
customer_reviews.text: It tastes sweet when I got this cereal rice and I tasted it. If it's original flavor, it's more better for baby
customer_reviews.author: Ao

customer_reviews.title: kkkkkkkkk
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my friend and he likes it very much, and i guess it is useful for him. whatever i rate 5 stars are great to have.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but it was expensive to send it to China by the transfer company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute earrings, perfect for every day wear or evening. Not heavy and easy to put on. Love that there are no backs to lose. I did receive this product at a reduced price for leaving an honest review
customer_reviews.author: tracie

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: This prevented my baby from getting his arms and legs stuck in the slats of his crib. Jungle design gave him a nice scene to check out. I have a solid back crib and had no problem with it fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

product_meta.title: Gerber Single-Grain Rice Baby Cereal, 16 Ounce (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: When your baby is ready to start solids, try Gerber Rice baby cereal. It has iron to help support learning ability - just 2 servings of baby cereal a day has 90% of your baby's daily value of iron. It also has Vitamin C and 6 B Vitamins for healthy growth and Calcium to help build healthy bones and teeth.
feature_bullets: (Packaging May Vary) Pack of six (6) 16 ounce containers, about 30 servings per container
Has iron to help support learning ability
Non-GMO: not made with genetically engineered ingredients
No artificial sweeteners, flavors or colors
Head to MyGerber.com to meet Dotti, your on-call personal baby expert, or call us anytime 24/7

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
